    streamFind for mass spectrometry with R

Function reference

R6 classes

The R6 classes are used as framework for reading, processing, inspecting and storing Mass Spectrometry (MS) and Spectroscopy data.

MassSpecData
MassSpecData R6 class and methods

S3 classes

S3 classes are implemented to harmonize, verify and dispatch data within the R6 classes. ProjectHeaders and ProcessingSettings S3 classes are used in all R6 classes.

ProjectHeaders() validate(<ProjectHeaders>) asJSON(<ProjectHeaders>) as.ProjectHeaders()
ProjectHeaders S3 class constructor, methods and functions
ProcessingSettings() validate(<ProcessingSettings>) print(<ProcessingSettings>) asJSON(<ProcessingSettings>) export(<ProcessingSettings>) as.ProcessingSettings()
ProcessingSettings S3 class constructor, methods and functions
MassSpecAnalysis() validate(<MassSpecAnalysis>) print(<MassSpecAnalysis>) asJSON(<MassSpecAnalysis>) as.MassSpecAnalysis() parse.MassSpecAnalysis()
MassSpecAnalysis S3 class constructor, methods and functions

Processing settings for MS data

The ProcessingSettings S3 class is used to store, assign and dispatch the algorithm and respective parameters to processing methods. The ProcessingSettings object obtains a subclass according to the assinged algorithm for each MS processing method. Below the available subclasses for ProcessingSettings are listed for each processing method.

centroid_spectra

Settings for the processing method centroid_spectra.

Settings_centroid_spectra_qCentroids()
Settings_centroid_spectra_qCentroids

bin_spectra

Settings for the processing method bin_spectra.

Settings_bin_spectra_qBinning()
Settings_bin_spectra_qBinning

find_features

Settings for the processing method find_features.

Settings_find_features_qPeaks()
Settings_find_features_qPeaks
Settings_find_features_xcms3_centwave()
Settings_find_features_xcms3_centwave
Settings_find_features_xcms3_matchedfilter()
Settings_find_features_xcms3_matchedfilter
Settings_find_features_openms()
Settings_find_features_openms
Settings_find_features_kpic2()
Settings_find_features_kpic2

group_features

Settings for the processing method group_features.

Settings_group_features_xcms3_peakdensity()
Settings_group_features_xcms3_peakdensity
Settings_group_features_xcms3_peakdensity_peakgroups()
Settings_group_features_xcms3_peakdensity_peakgroups

load_features MS1 and MS2 spectra

Settings for the processing methods starting with load_features, which aim to load data from raw MS files (e.g., MS1 and MS2 spectra).

Settings_load_features_ms1_streamFind() validate(<Settings_load_features_ms1_streamFind>)
Settings_load_features_ms1_streamFind
Settings_load_features_ms2_streamFind() validate(<Settings_load_features_ms2_streamFind>)
Settings_load_features_ms2_streamFind
Settings_load_groups_ms1_streamFind() validate(<Settings_load_groups_ms1_streamFind>)
Settings_load_groups_ms1_streamFind
Settings_load_groups_ms2_streamFind() validate(<Settings_load_groups_ms2_streamFind>)
Settings_load_groups_ms2_streamFind

filter_features

Settings for the processing method filter_features.

Settings_filter_features_streamFind() validate(<Settings_filter_features_streamFind>)
Settings_filter_features_streamFind

annotate_features

Settings for the processing method annotate_features.

Settings_annotate_features_streamFind() validate(<Settings_annotate_features_streamFind>)
Settings_annotate_features_streamFind

suspect_screening

Settings for the processing method suspect_screening.

Settings_suspect_screening_streamFind() validate(<Settings_suspect_screening_streamFind>)
Settings_suspect_screening_streamFind
Settings_suspect_screening_forident() validate(<Settings_suspect_screening_forident>)
Settings_suspect_screening_forident

General get and save default settings

Funtions to uniformily get and save ProcessingSettings are available. These return the default ProcessingSettings according the arguments call and algorithm.

get_default_ProcessingSettings()
get_default_ProcessingSettings
save_default_ProcessingSettings()
save_default_ProcessingSettings

Other MS functions

convert_ms_files()
Function to convert vendor MS files to mzML or mzXML
trim_ms_files_spectra()
Function to trim spectra in mzML or mzXML files
import_MassSpecData()
Function to import a MassSpecData class object from a json or rds file
make_ms_targets()
Function to make targets for parsing data within MassSpecData class methods
